00012 #if defined(_WIN32_WCE) && !defined(_CE_DCOM) && !defined(_CE_ALLOW_SINGLE_THREADED_OBJECTS_IN_MTA)
00013 #error "Single-threaded COM objects are not properly supported on Windows CE platform, such as the Windows Mobile platforms that do not include full DCOM support. Define _CE_ALLOW_SINGLE_THREADED_OBJECTS_IN_MTA to force ATL to support creating single-thread COM object's and allow use of it's single-threaded COM object implementations. The threading model in your rgs file was set to 'Free' as that is the only threading model supported in non DCOM Windows CE platforms."

00033 class CExpQueryParser
00034 {
00035 public:
00036 const static int cNewListItem =-1;
00037 const static int cNoListItem =-2;
00038   CExpQueryParser(CString attrname=L"") { Parse(attrname); }
00039   int Size() { return _attrs.size(); }
00040   int size() { return _attrs.size(); }
00041   CString & operator[](int i)
00042   {
00043     static CString tmp;
00044     if (i<0 || i>_attrs.size())
00045       return tmp;
00046     return _attrs[i];
00047   }
00048   static void Prune(CString & attr)
00049   {
00050     GetItemIndex(attr);
00051     GetItemClassname(attr);
00052   }
00053   static void ParentChild(CString attrname, CString &parent, CString &child)
00054   {
00055     int n;
00056     child.Empty();
00057     parent.Empty();
00058     if(attrname[attrname.GetLength()-1]=='/')
00059       attrname=attrname.Mid(0,attrname.GetLength()-1);
00060     // remove last attribute
00061     if((n = attrname.ReverseFind('/'))<0)
00062     {
00063       child=attrname;
00064       return ;
00065     }
00066     child = attrname.Mid(n+1); // +1 to skip /
00067     parent = attrname.Left(n);
00068   }
00069   void Parse(CString attr)
00070   {
00071     _attr = attr;
00072     _qualifiers.clear();
00073     _attrs = CStringVector::Tokenize(attr, _T("/"));
00074     _qualifiers.resize(_attrs.size());
00075     for(int i=0; i< _attrs.size(); i++)
00076     {
00077       int n;
00078       _qualifiers[i].index = GetItemIndex(_attrs[i]);
00079       _qualifiers[i].classname = GetItemClassname(_attrs[i]);
00080 
00081     }
00082 
00083   }
00084   int & Index(int i) { if(i<0 || i>=_qualifiers.size()) throw std::exception();  return  _qualifiers[i].index; }
00085   CString & Classname(int i) {if(i<0 || i>=_qualifiers.size()) throw std::exception();  return  _qualifiers[i].classname; }
00086 protected:
00087   static int GetItemIndex(CString & item)
00088   {
00089     int n=cNoListItem;
00090     CStringVector items = CStringVector::Tokenize(item, _T("[]"));
00091     if(items.size() < 2)
00092     {
00093       return n;
00094     }
00095     else if(items.size() > 1)
00096     {
00097       item=items[0];
00098       n = _tstoi(items[1]);
00099     }
00100     if(items.size() > 2)
00101     {
00102       item+=items[2];
00103     }
00104     return n; 
00105   }
00106 
00107   static  CString GetItemClassname(CString & item)
00108   {
00109     CString tmp;
00110     CStringVector items = CStringVector::Tokenize(item, _T("{}"));
00111     if(items.size() < 2)
00112     {
00113       return tmp;
00114     }
00115     else if(items.size() > 1)
00116     {
00117       item=items[0];
00118       return items[1];
00119     }
00120     if(items.size() > 2)
00121     {
00122       item+=items[2];
00123     }
00124     return tmp; 
00125 
00126 
00127   }
00128   struct CExpQueryAttributes
00129   {
00130     CExpQueryAttributes() { index=-2; }
00131     int index;
00132     CString indexqualifier;
00133     CString classname;
00134 
00135   };
00136 
00137   CString _attr;
00138   CStringVector _attrs;
00139   std::vector<CExpQueryAttributes> _qualifiers;
00140 
00141 };
00142

00147 class ATL_NO_VTABLE CStepPath :
00148   public CComObjectRootEx<CComSingleThreadModel>,
00149   public CComCoClass<CStepPath, &CLSID_StepPath>,
00150   public ISupportErrorInfo,
00151   public IDispatchImpl<IStepPath, &IID_IStepPath, &LIBID_NiStepLib, /*wMajor =*/ 1, /*wMinor =*/ 0>
00152 {
00153 public:

00155   CErrPairs _verifyerrors;

00157   CVarDefPtr projectvardef;  // top level of STEPNC++ Tree variables
00158   CVarDefs  stepncvardefs;
00159   CVarDefs  projectvardefs;
00160 
00161   CStepPath();
00162

00182   STDMETHODDECL loadFile(BSTR bstrFilename, VARIANT_BOOL* isSuccessful);
00183   STDMETHODDECL clearStep();
00184   STDMETHODDECL Verify(/*[out, retval]*/ VARIANT * stringsafearray);
00185   STDMETHODDECL CreateNode(/*[in]*/ BSTR clasname, /*[out, retval]*/ INode ** ppNode);
00186   STDMETHODDECL IsASimpleType(/*[in]*/ BSTR bstrClassname, /*[out, retval]*/  VARIANT_BOOL* flag);
00187   STDMETHODDECL IsASimpleListType(/*[in]*/ BSTR bstrVal, /*[out, retval]*/  VARIANT_BOOL* flag);
00188   STDMETHODDECL GetClassSupertypeHierarchy(/*[in]*/  BSTR bstrClassname, /*[out, retval]*/  VARIANT * stringsafearray);
00189   STDMETHODDECL GetRoot(INode ** ppNode);
00190   STDMETHODDECL GetRootAttribute(/*[out,retval]*/  IAttribute ** ppAttribute);
00191   STDMETHODDECL GetRootAttributeList(/*[out,retval]*/  IAttributeList ** ppAttributeList);
00192   STDMETHODDECL GetP21Header(INode ** ppNode);
00193   STDMETHODDECL GetP21HeaderAttribute(/*[out,retval]*/  IAttribute ** ppAttribute);
00194   STDMETHODDECL GetP21HeaderAttributeList(/*[out, retval]*/  IAttributeList ** ppAttributeList);
00195   STDMETHODDECL saveFile(/*[in]*/  BSTR bstrFilename, /*[out, retval]*/ VARIANT_BOOL* isSuccessful);
00196   STDMETHODDECL CreateNewProject(/*[out, retval]*/ INode ** ppNode);
00197   STDMETHODDECL TranslateP21ToHtml(/*[in]*/ BSTR bstrFilename, /*[out, retval]*/ BSTR * bstrHtml);
00198 
00199 };
